#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long int t;
    scanf("%ld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long int n;
        scanf("%ld",&n);
        if(n%2!=0)
            {
                n=n/2;
                printf("%ld\n",n*(n+1));
            }
        else
            {
                n=n/2-1;
                printf("%ld\n",(n*(n+1))+n+1);
            }
    }
    return 0;
}
